channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Founder of bankrupt subprime auto lender Tricolor Holdings is charged with fraud
item.description: The founder of Tricolor Holdings and other company executives have been charged with what federal authorities say was a massive fraud that led to the ...

item.title: An MIT professor was fatally shot at his home and police launched a homicide investigation
item.description: A professor at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology has been fatally shot at his home near Boston and authorities say they have launched a homici...

item.title: Investigators release additional video of possible Brown gunman as search continues
item.description: Authorities are asking the public for any footage they might have of the gunman who fatally shot two students and wounded nine others at Brown Univers...

item.title: A nightly tradition brings light and hope to children at Michigan hospital
item.description: A Michigan hospital is asking members of the public to raise their flashlights as well as the spirits of children during the holiday season

item.title: Senate voting on $901 billion defense bill that pushes Hegseth for boat strike video
item.description: The Senate is taking final votes to pass an annual military policy bill that will authorize $901 billion in defense programs
